content.p: Our Guide to Your Career gives you a glimpse into many aspects of your career journey. From getting involved in university activities to boosting your job prospects and securing an internship or graduate job, thereâ€™s something for everyone. Wherever you are with your career journey, this is where you can begin! Book a careers appointment Guide to your career Whether you've got a dream job in mind or don't know where to start, our careers experts can guide you every step of the way. Our Careers and Employability Service helps you research possible career paths, find job vacancies and add value to your CV. We also give you the opportunity to listen to and meet employers, alumni and industry speakers at various events throughout the year. To get careers advice from our experts you can book a one-to-one appointment or attend a drop-in session. Our Careers and Employability team also run workshops and careers fairs throughout the academic year.
